name: StampHere
description:
McGameJame 2018

Theme: "This isn't even my final form"

Play as a bureaucrat who need to stamp form all day to earn money. Be very careful not to accept the wrong form or denied a valid e form or else you might not have a job tomorrow.

HOW TO PLAY:  

-Launch the StampHere.exe

-Use your mouse to move the stamp and/or click objects in the game.
